p: Toxicity studies were carried out to address the safety of the P. curatellifolia leaf extracts on the integrity of the erythrocyte membrane as well as on normal somatic cells such as immune cells. The study will serve as a toxicology reference for further investigations on therapeutic practises and drug development research studies involving the use of P. curatellifolia. This study was aimed at investigating and determining the cytotoxic effect of different P. curatellifolia leaf extracts on normal mammalian cells.
